label.changeEmailDescription: Changing your email will change the email you use to login. You will be logged out and will have to login again with the new email
label.logOutDescription: You will be logged out and redirected to the homepage
label.changeUsernameDescription: Changing your username will change the username you use to login. You will be logged out and will have to login again with the new username
label.goneThroughtThisSet: You have go through this set
label.passwordExplanation: Password must be at least 8 characters long and contain at least one number and one letter. You will be logged out and will have to login again with the new password.
label.changeLanguageDescription: Changing the languages changes the UI language, but doesn't change the speaking language.
label.exportDataDescription: You can export your data as a .csv file. This includes all your sets, folders and flashcards. You can import this file in the future to restore your data.
label.deleteDataDescription: You can delete all your data. This includes all your sets, folders and flashcards. This action is irreversible.
label.deleteEverythingDescription: You can delete everything. This includes your account, all your sets, folders and flashcards. This action is irreversible.
label.minFlashcardsShownDescription: This is the minimum number an individual flashcard is shown during study mode
label.maxFlashcardsShownDescription: This is the minimum number an individual flashcard is shown during study mode
label.promptWithDescription: Choose what side of the flashcard you want to be prompted with
